name: Magic Music
description:
*NOTE: For the intended gameplay, you need the tab to be UNMUTED and the volume to be reasonable on your computer.*

This is Magic Music, a game for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, where the theme is "JOINED TOGETHER".  In this game, you play a mage whose fireball is linked to the background music. Whenever the track repeats, you shoot a fireball. You need to protect a crystal that is your life source.  If the blue guys touch the crystal, it's game over. Use the arrow keys or WASD to move.
